title: DIVINE. A Novel
description: Christian relics, ancient cults, and coldhearted conspiracy. Plan to take the day off! You won’t be able to put down Divine. Jay Davis, educated and smart beyond his years, learns at his mother’s deathbed that he has been cloned. As he discovers his centuries old bloodline, he finds himself in the crosshairs of an ambitious cardinal, an obscure Roman cult, and a group of Tibetan monks. Follow Jay as he grapples with the implications of his ancestry and confronts ruthless men bent on exploiting it. With the world at the brink of a new era, Jay’s powerful contenders are prepared to kill and deceive in order to fulfill their calling. The stakes are high: He who wins Jay’s favor will rule the Age of the Water Bearer.The chase takes the reader from a monastery in southern Germany, to age-old ruins in Cyprus and back to the foothills of the Alps. Locations and ancient faiths are reported true to form: Ptolemaic tombs, Roman gods, and Kashmiri shrines are historic certainties. Only into the third millennium, DIVINE’s narrative fades to fiction…
author: Tom van Menzing
